title: Stanhope raises £2.3m for AI that teaches machines to ‘make human-like decisions’
description:
Stanhope AI – a company applying decades of neuroscience research to teach machines how to make human-like decisions in the real world – has raised £2.3m in seed funding led by the UCL Technology Fund. Creator Fund also participated, along with, MMC Ventures, Moonfire Ventures and Rockmount Capital and leading angel investors.  Stanhope AI was... Read more »

The post Stanhope raises £2.3m for AI that teaches machines to ‘make human-like decisions’ appeared first on AI News</
